name: Pumpkin Default
description: The default Pumpkin CMS branded theme with pumpkin/bark/vine colour scales, sticky header, four-column footer, and full block-style overrides for all 14 block types.

classNames.root: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b border-neutral-200 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md
classNames.container: max-w-6xl mx-auto px-8 flex items-center justify-between h-16
classNames.logoText: text-lg font-extrabold text-neutral-900 tracking-tight group-hover:text-pumpkin-600 transition-colors
classNames.nav: hidden md:flex items-center gap-8 text-sm font-medium text-neutral-600
classNames.ctaButton: hidden md:inline-flex items-center gap-2 px-5 py-2 bg-pumpkin-500 text-white text-sm font-bold rounded-full hover:bg-pumpkin-600 transition-all shadow-sm

footer.description: An open-source, API-first content management system built for modern web teams.

classNames.container: max-w-6xl mx-auto px-8 py-12 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-8
classNames.columnTitle: text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-neutral-400 mb-3
classNames.bottomBarInner: max-w-6xl mx-auto px-8 py-4 flex items-center justify-between text-xs text-neutral-400

Hero.root: relative w-full min-h-[480px] flex items-center bg-gradient-to-br from-pumpkin-900 via-pumpkin-700 to-pumpkin-500 overflow-hidden
Hero.container: relative z-10 max-w-6xl mx-auto px-8 py-20 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-12 items-center
Hero.headline: text-4xl md:text-5xl lg:text-6xl font-extrabold text-white leading-tight tracking-tight
Hero.subheadline: text-lg md:text-xl text-pumpkin-100 mt-4 max-w-xl leading-relaxed
Hero.mainImage: mt-8 md:mt-0 rounded-2xl shadow-2xl max-w-full h-auto border-4 border-white/10
Hero.button: inline-flex items-center mt-8 px-8 py-3.5 bg-white text-pumpkin-700 font-bold rounded-full hover:bg-pumpkin-50 transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl

PrimaryCTA.root: relative w-full bg-gradient-to-r from-pumpkin-600 to-pumpkin-500 overflow-hidden
PrimaryCTA.container: relative z-10 max-w-5xl mx-auto px-8 py-20 flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center gap-12
PrimaryCTA.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-white tracking-tight
PrimaryCTA.button: inline-flex items-center mt-8 px-8 py-3.5 bg-white text-pumpkin-700 font-bold rounded-full hover:bg-pumpkin-50 transition-all shadow-lg

SecondaryCTA.title: text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-bark-900
SecondaryCTA.button: inline-flex items-center mt-8 px-8 py-3 bg-pumpkin-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full hover:bg-pumpkin-600 transition-all shadow-md hover:shadow-lg

CardGrid.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 tracking-tight
CardGrid.subtitle: text-lg text-neutral-500 mt-3 max-w-2xl mx-auto
CardGrid.card: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 p-6 hover:border-pumpkin-300 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-200 group
CardGrid.cardLink: inline-flex items-center mt-4 text-sm font-semibold text-pumpkin-600 hover:text-pumpkin-700 transition-colors

FAQ.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 tracking-tight
FAQ.subtitle: text-lg text-neutral-500 mt-3
FAQ.item: border border-neutral-200 rounded-xl overflow-hidden bg-white shadow-sm
FAQ.question: w-full flex items-center justify-between px-6 py-5 text-left font-semibold text-neutral-900 hover:bg-pumpkin-50/50 transition-colors cursor-pointer

TrustBar.icon: w-12 h-12 mb-3 text-4xl group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform

HowItWorks.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 text-center mb-14 tracking-tight
HowItWorks.stepImage: w-24 h-24 rounded-full object-cover mb-5 border-4 border-pumpkin-200
HowItWorks.stepNumber: w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-pumpkin-500 text-white text-base font-bold flex items-center justify-center mb-4 shadow-md

ServiceAreaMap.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 tracking-tight
ServiceAreaMap.subtitle: text-lg text-neutral-500 mt-3
ServiceAreaMap.mapWrapper: w-full rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-lg border border-neutral-200
ServiceAreaMap.listTitle: text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest text-pumpkin-600 mb-3
ServiceAreaMap.listItem: text-sm bg-white text-neutral-700 px-4 py-1.5 rounded-full border border-neutral-200 shadow-sm hover:border-pumpkin-300 transition-colors

LocalProTips.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 text-center mb-14 tracking-tight
LocalProTips.item: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 p-6 flex gap-5 hover:border-pumpkin-300 hover:shadow-md transition-all

Gallery.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 tracking-tight
Gallery.subtitle: text-lg text-neutral-500 mt-3
Gallery.imageWrapper: relative rounded-2xl overflow-hidden shadow-md group cursor-pointer border border-neutral-200 hover:border-pumpkin-300 transition-colors
Gallery.image: w-full h-52 object-cover group-hover:scale-105 transition-transform duration-300
Gallery.caption: absolute bottom-0 inset-x-0 bg-gradient-to-t from-black/80 to-transparent px-4 py-3 text-sm text-white opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity

Testimonials.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 tracking-tight
Testimonials.subtitle: text-lg text-neutral-500 mt-3
Testimonials.card: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 p-8 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
Testimonials.author: mt-5 text-sm font-bold text-neutral-900

Contact.container: max-w-5xl mx-auto px-8 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-14
Contact.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 tracking-tight
Contact.subtitle: text-lg text-neutral-500
Contact.socialLink: w-10 h-10 rounded-full bg-neutral-100 flex items-center justify-center text-neutral-600 hover:bg-pumpkin-500 hover:text-white transition-all
Contact.fieldInput: w-full px-4 py-2.5 text-sm border border-neutral-300 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pumpkin-400 focus:border-pumpkin-400 transition-all
Contact.fieldTextarea: w-full px-4 py-2.5 text-sm border border-neutral-300 rounded-xl focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-pumpkin-400 focus:border-pumpkin-400 transition-all min-h-[120px] resize-y
Contact.submitButton: w-full px-8 py-3 bg-pumpkin-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full hover:bg-pumpkin-600 transition-all shadow-md hover:shadow-lg

Blog.featuredImage: w-full rounded-2xl shadow-lg mb-10 object-cover max-h-[420px]
Blog.title: text-3xl md:text-4xl font-extrabold text-neutral-900 leading-tight tracking-tight
Blog.subtitle: text-lg text-neutral-500 mt-3
Blog.meta: flex flex-wrap items-center gap-4 mt-5 text-sm text-neutral-500
Blog.authorImage: w-9 h-9 rounded-full object-cover border-2 border-pumpkin-200
Blog.tag: text-xs bg-pumpkin-100 text-pumpkin-700 px-3 py-1 rounded-full font-medium
Blog.relatedCard: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-neutral-200 overflow-hidden hover:border-pumpkin-300 hover:shadow-md transition-all
